mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id , sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "secKill.seckill_id", s.name as "secKill.name", s.number as "secKill.number", s.start_time as "secKill.start_time", s.end_time as "secKill.end_time", s.create_time as "secKill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
